Uses of Class
im.tox.jtoxcore.ToxException

  • Packages that use ToxException 
    Package Description
    im.tox.jtoxcore
    This package supplies the base classes needed for using the Tox library in java.

    • Uses of ToxException in im.tox.jtoxcore

      Methods in im.tox.jtoxcore that throw ToxException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      F JTox.addFriend(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String data)
      Method used to add a friend.
      void JTox.bootstrap(java.lang.String host, int port, java.lang.String pubkey)
      Method used to bootstrap the client's connection.
      F JTox.confirmRequest(java.lang.String address)
      Confirm a friend request, or add a friend to your own list without sending them a friend request.
      void JTox.deleteFriend(int friendnumber)
      Method used to delete a friend
      void JTox.doTox()
      The main tox loop that needs to be run at least 20 times per second.
      java.lang.String JTox.getAddress()
      Get our own address
      java.lang.String JTox.getSelfName()
      Function to get our current name
      ToxUserStatus JTox.getSelfUserStatus()
      Get our own current status
      boolean JTox.isConnected()
      Check if the client is connected to the DHT
      void JTox.killTox()
      Kills the current instance, triggering a cleanup of all internal data structures.
      void JTox.refreshList()
      Refresh the friend list, looking for new friends, status changes, name changes etc.
      byte[] JTox.save()
      Save the internal messenger data to a byte array, which can be saved to a file or database
      void JTox.sendAction(F friend, java.lang.String action)
      Sends an IRC-like /me-action to a friend
      int JTox.sendMessage(F friend, java.lang.String message)
      Sends a message to the specified friend.
      int JTox.sendMessage(F friend, java.lang.String message, int messageID)
      Sends a message to the specified friend, with a specified ID
      void JTox.setName(java.lang.String newname)
      Sets our nickname
      void JTox.setSendReceipts(int friendnumber, boolean sendReceipts)
      Set whether or not to send read receipts to the originator of a message once we received a message.
      void JTox.setStatusMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sets our status message
      void JTox.setUserStatus(ToxUserStatus status)
      Set our current ToxUserStatus.
